Name: LU 280 - Landmarks, Public School Facility, East side of 6th Ave between Pacific St and Dean St, Brooklyn (20165028 SCK)
Title: Resolution approving the site plan for a new, approximately 616-Seat Public School Facility to be located on the east side of 6th Avenue between Pacific and Dean Streets (Block 1128, Lots 1, 4, 85, 86 and 87), Community District 8, Borough of Brooklyn (Non-ULURP No. 20165028 SCK; Preconsidered L.U. No. 280).

History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

\v0\par
By Council Members Greenfield and Koo\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928      \tab WHEREAS, the New York City School Construction Authority submitted to the Council on August 31, 2015, a site plan pursuant to Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law for a new, approximately 616-Seat Public School Facility to be located on the east side of 6\super th\nosupersub  Avenue between Pacific and Dean Streets (Block 1128, Lots 1, 4, 85, 86 and 87) in the Pacific Park section of Brooklyn, Community District No. 8, Borough of Brooklyn, serving students in Community School District No. 13 (the "Site Plan");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928     \tab WHEREAS, the Site Plan is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928      \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Site Plan on September 8, 2015;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues and the Supplemental SEQRA Findings Statement dated June 27, 2014, the Statement of Findings issued on December 8, 2006, and the Atlantic Yards Arena and Redevelopment Project Final Environmental Impact Statement dated December 8, 2006 (collectively, the \ldblquote Environmental Documents\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928       \tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Site Plan;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\tab Having considered the Environmental Documents with respect to the Site Plan, the Council finds that:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1080\tx1440 (1)\tab      The Environmental Documents meet the requirements of 6 N.Y.C.R.R. Part 617;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1440\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\ri139\qj\tx1440 (2)\tab From\expndtw20  \expndtw-1 among\expndtw20  \expndtw0 the\expndtw20  \expndtw-1 reasonable\expndtw20  \expndtw-1 alternatives\expndtw18  \expndtw0 thereto,\expndtw20  action to be approved\expndtw0  is one that avoids or minimizes adverse environmental impacts to the maximum extent practicable;\par
\expndtw-1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\expndtw0 (3)\tab The\expndtw4  \expndtw-1 adverse\expndtw4  \expndtw-1 environmental\expndtw4  \expndtw0 impacts of the Site Plan will be minimized or avoided to the maximum extent practicable\expndtw-1 ; and\expndtw0\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1080\f0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\tx0\tx1440 (4)     \tab The Site Plan along with the Environmental Documents constitute the written statement of facts, and of social, economic and other factors and standards that form the basis of the decision, pursuant to 6 N.Y.C.R.R. \'a7617.11(d).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928        \tab        \tab        \tab        \tab        \tab\tab\tab\par
      \tab Pursuant to Section 1732 of the Public Authorities Law, the Council approves the Site Plan.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx1800\tx2016\tx2070\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
Adopted.\par
